languages.text: The next attack made by an ally under the effect of {g|f:f3704377141641898e285c815c4ab1dc}Forced Distraction{/g} additionally grants +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to that ally.

traits.locale_text: The next attack made by the ally under the effect of Fight Me! additionally grants +3 MP to that ally.

languages.text: 受{g|f:f3704377141641898e285c815c4ab1dc}强迫诱导{/g}效果保护的盟友下次攻击之后，会额外获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 受朝我来啊！效果保护的盟友下次攻击之后，会额外获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。

languages.text: El próximo ataque efectuado por un aliado que esté bajo los efectos de {g|f:f3704377141641898e285c815c4ab1dc}Distracción forzada{/g} también concede +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} a ese aliado.

traits.locale_text: El próximo ataque efectuado por un aliado que esté bajo los efectos de Distracción forzada también concede +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} a ese aliado.

languages.text: Der nächste Angriff eines Verbündeten, der unter dem Einfluss von {g|f:f3704377141641898e285c815c4ab1dc}Erzwungene Ablenkung{/g} steht, gewährt diesem Verbündeten zusätzlich +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.

languages.text: L'attaque suivante lancée par un allié sous l'effet de {g|f:f3704377141641898e285c815c4ab1dc}Diversion forcée{/g} lui confère +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} de plus.

languages.text: 注意の転導の効果を受けている味方による次の攻撃は、その味方にさらに{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を+3与える。

languages.text: {g|f:f3704377141641898e285c815c4ab1dc}Zorla Dikkat Dağıtan{/g} etkisi altındaki bir dost birim tarafından yapılan bir sonraki saldırı, o dost birime ek olarak +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazandırır.
